Nduka Obaigbena
Nduka Obaigbena na ncheta omumu ya afọ iri isii na Cathedral Church of Christ, Legọọsụ
Ọmụmụ	14 Julaị 1959
Ibadan, Western Region, Naịjirịa
a
Mba	Naịjirịa
Ebe ọrụ	Leaders and Company Limited, Delta Steeti
Ihe eji mara	Onye mbipụta, ThisDay Newspaper, Onye isi, Arise News Channel
Nduka Obaigbena, Onye isi ndi obodo Owa
Ọ bụ onye guzobere akwụkwọ akụkọ  "THISDAY Media Group", "ARISE News Channe"l  na akwụkwọ nlebanye anya na ọmenala nke Afrịka bụ ARISE Magazine
A mụrụ ya na Ibadan na mpaghara ndịda ọdịda anyanwụ, Naịjirịa na Julaị 14, 1959 n'obi eze nke ndị Owa Kingdom, Delta Steeti
Obaigbena gara akwụkwọ na Edo College,  Benin , na Mahadum Benin
Ọ gara Schoollọ Akwụkwọ Gụsịrị Akwụkwọ na Business na Mahadum nke Witwatersrand, Johannesburg na Advanced Management Program na Mahadum Cape Town
Ọ tọrọ ntọala akwụkwọ akụkọ Nigeria bụ Thisday na 1995

Na 2000 Obaigbena mepere "Thisday Award" nke na-enye nkwanye ugwu nke ndị na-enyere aka ikwalite Naịjirịa na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, azụmaahịa mba ụwa, ụmụnwanyị ndị wepụtara isi na ndị na-akwalite agụm akwụkwọ Naịjirịa

Na 2013, ọ malitere ọwa ozi TV mba ụwa nke ha gbadoro anya n'Afrịka, Arise News,   Ha na ndị Globecast banyere nkwekọrịta na  maka nnyefe sachịlaịt na Astra 2G maka mgbasa ozi na UK Sky,  na Hot Bird maka nkesa USB,  nwere ntọala ndị dị na London, New York City, Johannesburg, na Legọọsụ
Obaigbena bụ sinetọ na 1991
A họpụtara ya ka ọ bụrụ otu onye n’ime ogbakọ iwu na 1994
Obaigbena bụ onye na-abịa oge ọ bụla na onye nhazi oge maka "World Economic Forum" ma rụọ ọrụ dịka onye otu Kọmitii na-ahọpụta ndị isi ntorobịa  na nchịkọta mba ụwa

Ọ bụ onye isi oche nke Association of Proprietors 'Association of Nigeria  (NPAN) yana Onye isi oche  ndị nta akụkọ na-ahụ Maka Mgbasa Ozi nke Nigeria - gụnyere NPAN, National Union of Journalists na Naịjirịan Guild of Editors ebe ọ bụ onye ibe
.Ọ tọrọ ntọala akwụkwọ akụkọ Nigeria bụ Thisday na 1995

Na 2000 Obaigbena mepere "Thisday Award" nke na-enye nkwanye ugwu nke ndị na-enyere aka ikwalite Naịjirịa na ndọrọ ndọrọ ọchịchị, azụmaahịa mba ụwa, ụmụnwanyị ndị wepụtara isi na ndị na-akwalite agụm akwụkwọ Naịjirịa

Na 2013, ọ malitere ọwa ozi TV mba ụwa nke ha gbadoro anya n'Afrịka, Arise News,   Ha na ndị Globecast banyere nkwekọrịta na  maka nnyefe sachịlaịt na Astra 2G maka mgbasa ozi na UK Sky,  na Hot Bird maka nkesa USB,  nwere ntọala ndị dị na London, New York City, Johannesburg, na Legọọsụ
O guzobekwara ARISE Magazine

E bidoro mbipụta a na THISDAY Miziik & Fashọnụ Fesịtịịva na họọlụ ndị London Royal Albert na 14 Ọktoba 2008,  were rụọ ọrụ mmepe na izu ụka a na-akpọ “ARISE (AFRỊKA) FASHỌNỤ” nke malitere na Johannesburg na Cape Town, South Afrịka, ma mesịa chọta ụlọ na Legọọsụ Naịjirịa - mgbe emechara ngosi nke ndị nchịkọta ejije ndị Afrịka na Royal Albert Họọlụ, London, Kennedy Centre, Washington DC,Lincoln Centre,New York
Na ARISE Fashọnụ Wiiki gosipụtara ụfọdụ afọ na New York na Paris Fashọnụ Wiiki
Obaigbena malitere emume Egwuregwu na Ejiji na 2006

Ihe emume ahụ gụnyere ọtụtụ egwu dị ka Beyonce, Jay Z, Rihanna, John Legend, Lionel Richie, Dianna Ross, Alicia Keys, Mary J Blige, Snoop Dogg, 50 Cent, Busta Rhyme, Black Eyed Peas, Missy Elliott, Usher, Naomi Campbell, Alec Wek, Liya Kedebe, Oluchi, wdg
Ọ mepụtakwara mmemme onyinye nke Thisday
Tupu mbido Arise News, ụfọdụ ndị ọrụ na ndị na-ebubata ihe ahịa mere mkpesa gbasara Obaigbena na ọ naghị akwụ ụgwọ mgbe ọ kwesịrị
Obaigbena akwụchara ndị niile o ji ụgwọ

Ka afọ atọ gachara o bidoro akwụkwọ akụkọ Arise News, Obaigbena tinyere aka na nyocha nke ndị ụlọọrụ na-ahụ maka mpụ na akụnaụba Naịjirịa na Naịjirịa (EFCC) na-eme, nke na-enyocha ego e mefuru   $2.1 ijeri
Usoro nyocha a metụtara ọrụ Obaigbena
Banyere oge a, ndị ọrụ nọ na mkpesa maka ụgwọ eji ha
